items.title: Gazebo Simulation for Digital Twins
items.description: Creating and using digital twins of humanoid robots in Gazebo simulation environment

items.title: Module 2 Summary: Gazebo & Unity - Digital Twins
items.description: Summary of simulation environments and digital twin concepts for humanoid robotics

items.title: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics: Bridging Digital and Physical Intelligence
items.description: A comprehensive technical book on building AI systems for humanoid robots, covering ROS 2, simulation, NVIDIA Isaac, and Vision-Language-Action systems.
